scripts.copyDeps: bash -c "mkdir -p assets/lib && cp ../node_modules/amf-js/src/amf.js assets/lib && cp ../node_modules/zlibjs/bin/rawinflate.min.js assets/lib"
scripts.dev: yarn copyDeps && cp ../CHANGELOG.md ./assets && elm-live src/Main.elm --open --dir=assets -- --output assets/elm.js
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && yarn copyDeps && cp ../CHANGELOG.md dist/ && cp -rp assets/* dist/ && elm make src/Main.elm --optimize --output dist/elm.js
